name: Benless Bunner
description:
Welcome to Benless Bunner, our rendition of an endless runner! We made this as part of UCSC's Game Design program, and in particular, their 120 series class. We were tasked with making an endless runner, and we decided to turn the idea into an endless shooter! Taking inspiration from shoot-em-ups and bullet hells of the past, we wanted to take their mechanics but tie in a softer, more childlike aesthetic to them, and this is the result. We hope you enjoy!

Credits: Solomon Bell, Jackson Gerard, and Esmerelda Rangel
